title: Bowl, 1968
markings: Incised signature on unglazed underside of base: "HVP" in monogram and "68".
dimensions: H x diam.: 10.8 x 33 cm (4 1/4 x 13 in.)
description: Bowl rests on circular foot. Sides irregularly pleated, with pleats flaring up and out at extreme angle to creat concavity. Exterior glazed in mottled red and green with calligraphic brushstrokes in black around foot. Interior glazed in heavily mottled red and pale green; in center of interior a branch with leaves and fruit incised and painted in black. Artist's monogram and "68" incised in center to side of fruits.

tombstone.epitaph:
Bowl, 1968.
1968. Stoneware. Gift of S.C.Johnson & Son, Inc.. 1980-18-10.
